text: Hugo Carvana (4 June 1937 - 4 October 2014) was a Brazilian movie and television actor and director. He appeared in 65 movie since 1955. He was known for his roles in Entranced Earth and in Antonio das Mortes. He was also known for directing Casa da MÃ£e Joana. Carvana died of an illness in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, aged 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro
title: Hugo Carvana
